ðŸŽ¬ 1. Understand the Types of Computer Animation There are a few main categories:

2D Animation (like traditional cartoons or motion graphics) 3D Animation (used in films, games, and simulations) Stop Motion (which might appeal to you as a sculptor) Motion Capture (used in realistic character animation) Would you like to focus on one of these?
